testcase.name: Podam should choose the lightest constructor when the standard manufacturing method is invoked
Podam should manufacture package private POJOs
Podam should be able to manufacture instances of the Observable class
Podam should be able to instantiate POJOs with immutable Collections
Podam should be able to create instances of JAXBElements declared as instance variables in a POJO
Podam should be able to manufacture any type of Lists
Podam should be able to create instances of inner classes
Podam should be able to manufacture POJOs which contain immutable collections
Podam should handle generics in the constructor
Podam should be able to create instances of generic POJOs with factory methods when the concrete type is known
Podam should create instances of POJOs extending generic classes
Podam should handle classes with generic Key/Value types
Podam should handle generics in setters during Pojo instantiation
Podam should be able to manufacture any type of Maps
Podam should handle constructors with generic arrays during Pojo instantiation
Podam should be able to instantiate POJOs with immutable Maps
Podam should handle constructors with multiple generics during Pojo instantiation
Podam should be able to create instances of abstract POJOs with factory methods which return concrete types
Podam should choose the fullest constructor when invoked for full data
Podam should handle generics in static constructors during POJO instantiation
Podam should be able to create instances of JAXBElement
